==Trivia==

=== Etymology ===

* {{W|Aubade}} is a morning love song, or a song or poem about lovers separating at dawn. The tradition of aubades goes back at least to the {{W|Troubadour|troubadours}} of the {{W|Occitan literature|Provençal}} schools of courtly love in the {{W|High Middle Ages}}.
